caller_intent: The caller wanted to pay their auto insurance premium for a policy with Auto Owners.
resolution_steps: Agent retrieved the caller's account showing a balance of $1,232.90.
Agent confirmed payment method (credit card) and accessed a payment portal.
Agent used a saved Visa card ending in 5581 for payment.
Agent requested the caller's preferred email address for confirmation (Gmail).
Agent confirmed payment processing and sent confirmation email.
summary: Customer called to pay their Auto Owners auto insurance premium. Agent processed the payment using a saved credit card and sent confirmation via Gmail. The call concluded with standard closing remarks.
